about_the_game:
We sincerely hope to hear your voice. Whether it’s praise or criticism, your feedback is our driving force for progress.

Customizable paths

"I Am The Registered Environmental Engineer" is a hardcore strategy tower defense game with an environmental protection theme.

Unlike traditional tower defense games, the waste (i.e., the monsters) here only has a designated "starting point" and no designated "end point." The direction and path of waste movement are entirely planned by the player.

Different types of waste require different handling methods; proper gathering and sorting are key to solving the problem!

Upgrade Your Equipment

  • 15+ powerful cleaning devices, each unique and irreplaceable.

  • Dozens of chips with different functions can be inserted into devices to amplify their capabilities and improve cleaning efficiency.

  • Gain new abilities through knowledge and support in five major areas: industry, technology, economy, culture, and policy, enhancing your combat power.

Challenge Different Areas

  • A total of 5 main levels and 25 sub-levels, with multiple game modes for you to choose from.

  • Each level has unique gameplay and map elements. Make full use of them to make your cleaning work more efficient.

Become a Hero

Even a small engineer has the power to save the world! Pack your gear, get ready, and charge with your partners towards the mastermind behind the pollution that threatens humanity!

short_description: This world is plagued by pollution, and as an engineer, you need to plan waste routes, gather, sort, and transport it to safe areas. Use powerful equipment to finally clean it up and restore cleanliness to the world.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, French, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Korean, Spanish - Spain, Russian
